Author: Georgie_Shrinks
Text: Yep, if you purge often enough your body gets less 'responsive' I guess.  Has happened to me a number of times before, which is kind of a blessing and a curse because purging is so bad for you, and if I know I won't be able to purge I'm a lot less likely to binge. Though I find if I don't try to purge for a while, the sensitivity comes back and the cycle starts over again :(

Author: bubblewrapmcthousand
Text: yeah same here. i can hardly do it lately. ive heard that your gag reflex becomes weaker and weaker with prolonged purging. i guess itâ€™s because your body catches onto the damage being done and tries to prevent it.
